name: mysticticket
effect: Provides access to Navel Rock, ho oh, and lugia.
short_effect: Allows access to Navel Rock and Lugia or Ho-oh.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A ticket required
to board the ship
to NAVEL ROCK.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A ticket required to board the ship
to NAVEL ROCK.
It glows with a mystic light.
